drills.name: Flipper Skills
drills.description: Send the ball anywhere and always use a catch or pass to get the ball under control.

drills.name: Table Geometry
drills.description: Focus on key feeds and repeatable ways to return the ball. Nudging, drop/ski/post passes.

drills.name: Accuracy
drills.description: Pick a specific shot and try to hit it 5x in a row, then move to a different shot.

reminders: It's a game, there are no stakes.
Visualize how you want the game to go.
Respond, don't react. Keep mental space.
Your body knows what to do, trust it.
Acknowledge stray thoughts and let them go.
